main event: A civilian observed a small object that appeared to be the size of a quarter, which gradually faded out during a 5-minute observation.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 6 October 1957 in Kremmling, Colorado., The object was described as being stationary during the observation., The possible explanations for the sighting include a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena., The visibility during the sighting was noted as good with scattered clouds., The observer was driving a car when they looked up to see the object.
sighted object: an object the size of a quarter
witness description: civilian who was driving a car
